mapper.insert: insert into file_info (file_id, file_name, file_url, file_size, create_user, create_time) values (#{fileId},#{fileName},#{fileUrl},#{fileSize}, 1,#{createTime})

insert into file_info (file_id, file_name, file_url, file_size, create_user, create_time) values
(#{i.fileId},#{i.fileName},#{i.fileUrl},#{i.fileSize}, 1,#{i.createTime})
